Breadcrumb.Container.name: separator
Breadcrumb.Container.description: Alters the separator rendered between each breadcrumb item.

Breadcrumb.Item.name: active
Breadcrumb.Item.description: Alters the breadcrumb item to render bolder when active. Sets aria-current="page" on Breadcrumb.Anchor.

Breadcrumb.Anchor.name: href
Breadcrumb.Anchor.description: Changes the URL that Breadcrumb.Anchor navigates end-users to when clicked.

Breadcrumb.Anchor.name: download
Breadcrumb.Anchor.description: If linking to a downloadable file, this property will be used as the suggested file name.

Breadcrumb.Anchor.name: rel
Breadcrumb.Anchor.description: Sets how the Breadcrumb.Anchor relates to the current page, see MDN for more information.

Breadcrumb.Anchor.name: target
Breadcrumb.Anchor.description: Sets the target of the Breadcrumb.Anchor being navigated, see MDN for more information.

snippets.title: Breadcrumb Preview
Breadcrumb Imports
Breadcrumb Separator

data.render:
Breadcrumb

Breadcrumb is typically used to render a series of links with separators. With the each link left of the right-most a state in the end-user's navigation history. Or, a route hierarchy of the Web Application. e.g. directory paths

Imports

<script>
    import {Breadcrumb} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const {Container, Anchor, Item} = Breadcrumb;
</script>

Separator

You can alter the separator between items rendered via the separator property.
